address.street: 4th Floor, Prestige Dotcom, Field Marshal Cariappa Road, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar

descriptor.name: WOW Life Science Plant Based Protein Powder - Cafe Mocha Flavour 500 g
descriptor.short_desc: our plant-based protein powder is formulated with a blend of pea & brown rice protein + grape seed extract + pumpkin seed extract + flaxseed powder + himalayan pink salt. grape seed extract has an antioxidant effect. himalayan pink salt can aid in hydration post-workout. our vegan protein powder is vegan, plant-based, and contains essential amino acids that cannot be naturally produced by the body. our plant-based protein powder that is cholesterol-free and sugar-free helps in easy digestion. each scoop of this powder contains 25g of protein per serving from plant-based sources. our vegan protein powder is ideal for young adults, adults, and the elderly irrespective of their levels of activity. for those under 18s, take advice from a healthcare professional before use. it comes in this delicious café mocha flavor to give you the taste of your favorite coffee as you consume your daily protein intake.
descriptor.long_desc: our plant-based protein powder is formulated with a blend of pea & brown rice protein + grape seed extract + pumpkin seed extract + flaxseed powder + himalayan pink salt. grape seed extract has an antioxidant effect. himalayan pink salt can aid in hydration post-workout. our vegan protein powder is vegan, plant-based, and contains essential amino acids that cannot be naturally produced by the body. our plant-based protein powder that is cholesterol-free and sugar-free helps in easy digestion. each scoop of this powder contains 25g of protein per serving from plant-based sources. our vegan protein powder is ideal for young adults, adults, and the elderly irrespective of their levels of activity. for those under 18s, take advice from a healthcare professional before use. it comes in this delicious café mocha flavor to give you the taste of your favorite coffee as you consume your daily protein intake.

descriptor.name: Plant-Based Protein Powder - Made from Pea & Brown Rice Protein - Chocolate Flavour– For a healthier lifestyle – 1kg
descriptor.short_desc: wow life science plant protein is formulated with a blend of pea protein and brown rice protein. this powder is a vegan plant-based complete protein powder with all the essential amino acids that cannot be naturally produced by the body. each scoop of this powder contains 25g of protein from plant sources.
descriptor.long_desc: wow life science plant protein is formulated with a blend of pea protein and brown rice protein. this powder is a vegan plant-based complete protein powder with all the essential amino acids that cannot be naturally produced by the body. each scoop of this powder contains 25g of protein from plant sources.
